Class Earthquake

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Earthquake
extends Projectile

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float COLLIDER_HEIGHT 
      static float COLLIDER_WIDTH
      Stores the width and height of the Earthquake's rectangle collider in world units.
      static float DAMAGE
      Stores the amount of damage dealt by the Earthquake when hitting a Human.
      static float FIRE_VELOCITY_X
      Holds the velocity at which the earthquake travels.
      static float FIRE_VELOCITY_Y 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Earthquake()
      Creates a default Earthquake instance at bottom-center position (0,0).
      Earthquake(float x, float y)
      Instantiates an Earthquake instance at the given bottom-center (x,y) position.

    • Field Detail

      • COLLIDER_WIDTH

        public static final float COLLIDER_WIDTH
        Stores the width and height of the Earthquake's rectangle collider in world units. (Smaller than actual image so that collisions are forgiving)
